candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (2 votes): claude_haiku: Blockchain and Bitcoin mining exposure with extreme volatility. Follows crypto cycles with sharp reversals. It matches the high‑volatility, sector‑rotation pattern of WULF and the EV boom/bust cycle seen in MARA.; claude_haiku: Chinese EV manufacturer with meme stock following and extreme volatility.
